TopicTitle: Can't do anything from space center, can't get out of R&D

Articles.Content: So got KSP for christmas, having a lot of fun. The game has crashed a few times but worked fine when I restarted it. However, this time, without a crash, I couldn't click on anything from the space center - right or left click, it just wouldn't do anything. Finally I got into R&D, and now I can't get out. I clicked the back button and it just displayed the space center's bars without actually going back. I can still manipulate the R&D screen, but neither back button works. I've tried restarting, and it doesn't help. What can I do? Is this save permanently corrupted?

Give this one a read ErasmoGnome - sounds familiar and Claw has done some work on figuring out how to fix/prevent it

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-FIX-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game

Trigger's right, that looks exactly like the same problem. In fact, I will probably steal your screen shot to include as an example in my post, if that's okay with you?

Let us know if you have questions.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
